attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
the family court has gained a world wide reputation for discrimination against men, in favour of women.
the images of fathers climbing the walls dressed in costumes suggests something very seriously wrong with the family courts.
It is vital children do not become victims of an unjust court system.
It is vital fairness and equality is the norm!
An independent enquirey should be actioned to check for bias in the family court!

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement. Please rephrase the title of your petition and resubmit.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
